Class CollectiveOps

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.CollectiveOps
public final class CollectiveOps extends Object
An API for building collective operations as Ops
See Also:
  • Ops

    • collectiveGather

      public <T extends TNumber> CollectiveGather<T> collectiveGather(Operand<T> input, Operand<TInt32> groupSize, Operand<TInt32> groupKey, Operand<TInt32> instanceKey, Iterable<Operand<? extends TType>> orderingToken, CollectiveGather.Options... options)
      Mutually accumulates multiple tensors of identical type and shape. is_stateless means each op does not need control dependencies to other collective ops. In this case, keys that are unique at runtime (e.g. instance_key) should be used to distinguish collective groups.
      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for CollectiveGatherV2 output and operands
      Parameters:
      input - The input value
      groupSize - The groupSize value
      groupKey - The groupKey value
      instanceKey - The instanceKey value
      orderingToken - The orderingToken value
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of CollectiveGather

    • collectiveInitializeCommunicator

      public CollectiveInitializeCommunicator collectiveInitializeCommunicator(Operand<TInt32> groupKey, Operand<TInt32> rank, Operand<TInt32> groupSize, CollectiveInitializeCommunicator.Options... options)
      Initializes a group for collective operations.
      Parameters:
      groupKey - The groupKey value
      rank - The rank value
      groupSize - The groupSize value
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of CollectiveInitializeCommunicator

    • collectivePermute

      public <T extends TType> CollectivePermute<T> collectivePermute(Operand<T> input, Operand<TInt32> sourceTargetPairs)
      An Op to permute tensors across replicated TPU instances. Each instance supplies its own input.

      For example, suppose there are 4 TPU instances: [A, B, C, D]. Passing source_target_pairs=[[0,1],[1,2],[2,3],[3,0]] gets the outputs: [D, A, B, C].

      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for CollectivePermute output and operands
      Parameters:
      input - The local input to be permuted. Currently only supports float and bfloat16.
      sourceTargetPairs - A tensor with shape [num_pairs, 2].
      Returns:
      a new instance of CollectivePermute

    • collectiveReduce

      public <T extends TNumber> CollectiveReduce<T> collectiveReduce(Operand<T> input, Operand<? extends TType> communicator, Operand<TInt32> groupAssignment, String reduction, CollectiveReduce.Options... options)
      Mutually reduces multiple tensors of identical type and shape.
      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for CollectiveReduceV3 output and operands
      Parameters:
      input - The input value
      communicator - The communicator value
      groupAssignment - The groupAssignment value
      reduction - The value of the reduction attribute
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of CollectiveReduce

    • collectiveReduceScatter

      public <T extends TNumber> CollectiveReduceScatter<T> collectiveReduceScatter(Operand<T> input, Operand<TInt32> groupSize, Operand<TInt32> groupKey, Operand<TInt32> instanceKey, Iterable<Operand<? extends TType>> orderingToken, String mergeOp, String finalOp, CollectiveReduceScatter.Options... options)
      Mutually reduces multiple tensors of identical type and shape and scatters the result. is_stateless means each op does not need control dependencies to other collective ops. In this case, keys that are unique at runtime (e.g. instance_key) should be used to distinguish collective groups.
      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for CollectiveReduceScatterV2 output and operands
      Parameters:
      input - The input value
      groupSize - The groupSize value
      groupKey - The groupKey value
      instanceKey - The instanceKey value
      orderingToken - The orderingToken value
      mergeOp - The value of the mergeOp attribute
      finalOp - The value of the finalOp attribute
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of CollectiveReduceScatter

    • ops

      public final Ops ops()
      Get the parent Ops object.
